alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Koolau Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued October 17 at 3:30PM HST until October 18 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU AND KAUAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF OAHU MOLOKAI AND MAUI... .A northwest swell (320 to 340 degrees) has peaked but will continue to generate low-end advisory level surf along north and west facing shores of Niihau and Kauai and along north facing shores of Oahu, Molokai, and Maui. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT..Surf of 12 to 16 feet, though surf of 8 to 12 ft along west facing shores of Kauai and Niihau. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau and Kauai. North facing shores of Oahu, Molokai, and Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.
